challenges.title: Challenges

typesDesc.looserMultiplier: Points will be calculated based on progress times multiplier. For example if multiplier is 5, and first day your proggress is 5 less than starting value, then the points gained would be 25 (5 x 5 = 25)
typesDesc.gainerMultiplier: Points will be calculated based on progress times multiplier. For example if multiplier is 5, and first day your proggress is 2 more than starting value, then the points gained would be 25 (5 x 2 = 10)

challenges.notePlaceholder: Enter more information here, motivate yourself...

social.receivedFriendInvitation: You have received friend invitation. Friend:
social.receivedClashInvitation: You have received party join invitation from

tooltips.todosSort: Here you can choose between viewing done and not done tasks. You can also change your sort order by date or name.  When you click on the sort date or name twice it will change the direction from ascending to descending.
tooltips.havitStreakBadge: First badge represents your current or latest streak, second badge represents your biggest streak for this habit.  The higher the current streak the bigger the rewards.
tooltips.habitsSeed: Different seeds will produce different plants, you can view these in the top banner.  You can buy seends at the market, located in the market
tooltips.addFriends: You will be able to see your friends progress, chat, and encourage eachother
tooltips.habitRegularity: Streaks don't have to be done every day, set your regularity here, streaks will be based on this selection
tooltips.habitDifficultry: The higher the difficultry the bigger the rewards
